data.comment: The match is underway in Derby.
The first-half has come to a close in Derby.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
George Evans (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Phillip Cocu (Derby County) is making a first substitution, with Tom Lawrence replacing Duane Holmes.
In the minute 72, Craig Cathcart is on a sub for William Troost-Ekong for Watford.
Joao Pedro puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Ben Wilmot with an assist there.
In the minute 81, Jahmal Hector-Ingram is replacing Graeme Shinnie for Derby County at Pride Park Stadium.
The home team have replaced Lee Buchanan with Morgan Whittaker. This is the third substitution made today by Phillip Cocu.
Vladan Ivic (Watford) has taken off Joao Pedro who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Glenn Murray is the replacement.
In the minute 89, Vladan Ivic is making the team's third substitution at Pride Park Stadium with James Garner replacing Domingos Quina.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Ben Wilmot (Watford) gets a yellow card.
